sentences.sContent: Slubby yarn is divided into periodicity slubby yarn and random slubby yarn.
sentences.sContent_eng: Slubby yarn is divided into periodicity slubby yarn and random slubby yarn.
sentences.sCn: 将竹节纱分为周期性竹节纱和随机竹节纱。

sentences.sContent: In some cell lines there is a similar periodicity in changes of cell surface antigenicity or response to wheat germ agglutinin.
sentences.sContent_eng: In some cell lines there is a similar periodicity in changes of cell surface antigenicity or response to wheat germ agglutinin.
sentences.sCn: 在某些细胞系中，细胞表面抗原性或对表胚凝集素的反应方面有相近似的周期性变化。

sentences.sContent: One timing system comes from the evidence of our senses and stomachs, and the periodicity we experience when living in a particular time zone.
sentences.sContent_eng: One timing system comes from the evidence of our senses and stomachs, and the periodicity we experience when living in a particular time zone.
sentences.sCn: 一个定时系统来自于我们的感官和胃的证明，就是当我们生活在一个特定的时区所经历的周期性。

words.tran: 定期地；周期性地；偶尔；间歇
周期，期间；时期；月经；课时
